title: My phone stop charge while it open, Pixel 2xl
content:
About a week, My phone died and I try to charge from power bank. It kind of a bit charge during me on the way to go home from work about 8 minutes. So then my phone turn off and I plug in to the cable charger at home. It show the picture charge, when I turn on the phone it won't charge at all. 
I have 2 cable charger and I try for both of it, it's still couldn't work however I try the USB with my power bank that it work. therefore, now I have to charge my phone with power bank only one way.
